com.hidglobal.biosdk

Interface BioSDKAPI


  • public interface BioSDKAPI
    The Bio SDK API interface. Provides methods to enumerate, open, return, and close devices.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeDevices()
      Close devices.
      void enumerateDevices(BioSDKVisitor visitor)
      Enumerates devices.
      BioSDKDevice getBioDevice(int nIndexNo)
      Gets Bio SDK Device interface.
      BioSDKDevice openDevice(int nDeviceNo)
      Opens the Bio SDK Device interface and returns it.

    • Method Detail

      • enumerateDevices

        void enumerateDevices(BioSDKVisitor visitor)
        Enumerates devices. visitor callback receives status of enumeration, including if the device can be found.
        Parameters:
        visitor - the BioSDKVisitor

      • openDevice

        BioSDKDevice openDevice(int nDeviceNo)
        Opens the Bio SDK Device interface and returns it.
        Parameters:
        nDeviceNo - the n device number (0 based)
        Returns:
        the bio sdk device

      • getBioDevice

        BioSDKDevice getBioDevice(int nIndexNo)
        Gets Bio SDK Device interface.
        Parameters:
        nIndexNo - the n index number (0 based)
        Returns:
        the bio device

      • closeDevices

        void closeDevices()
        Close devices.
